nodes.text: Blue Milk Cooler was an alcoholic beverage sold at the Milk Stand in Batuu's Black Spire Outpost. The drink was based on the original non-alcoholic frozen blue milk drink available at the stand, which used milk farmed locally from female banthas, but with the addition of rum.

Blue Milk and Green Milk drinks were available at the Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge Milk Stand in both Disneyland and Disney's Hollywood Studios on opening day, but only the Hollywood Studios version included alcoholic "cooler" variations of the beverages. The menu's description of the Blue Milk Cooler reads, "Plant-based blend of Coconut and Rice Milk with alluring fruity characteristics featuring Bacardi Rum."
